arts.ttl: Essende's double secures second consecutive away victory for Augsburg in Bremen
arts.sum: Samuel Essende fires past the Bremen defence to score Augsburg's second goal - IMAGO/nordphoto GmbH / Kokenge Augsburg's perfect away-day showing secured a 2-0 win at Werder Bremen, with both goals coming courtesy of Samuel Essende scoring both goals.

arts.ttl: Essende brace puts Augsburg past Werder
arts.sum: Samuel Essende scored both goals as Augsburg beat Werder Bremen 2-0 in the final Bundesliga game of the weekend.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs FC Augsburg preview: Die Werderaner aim to bounce back from heartbreak
arts.sum: Werder Bremen will look to continue their European push against an Augsburg side ready to play the role of spoilers once again.

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Augsburg - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Augsburg, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
